snippet: The firm, Bowery Capital, plans to invest in business-oriented start-ups with a marketing or technology focus. It is led by Mike Brown Jr., who previously co-founded AOL Ventures.
abstract: The firm, Bowery Capital, plans to invest in business-oriented start-ups with a marketing or technology focus. It is led by Mike Brown Jr., who previously co-founded AOL Ventures.

headline.main: New Venture Firm Opens in New York
